channel.title: Network on Mischa Friegang
channel.description: Recent content in Network on Mischa Friegang

item.title: CGNAT Traversal with Wireguard
item.description: ** Note, as of ~mid 2022, I moved over to Tailscale, and eventually Twingate. This was a fun project, but Twingate does the job without the cost of the VPS Where I live there are essentially 2 options for(usable in this day and age) internet, you go with one of the local WISPs, or you use LTE in some form. The latter of the 2 is what I have ended up with after a few years of spotty and slow sevice with 2 different WISPs.
